greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of 2n into exactly n positive triangular numbers.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, `if`(k=0, 1, 0),
`if`(i*k<n or k>n, 0, b(n, h(i-1), k)+b(n-i, h(min(n-i, i)), k-1)))
mathematica: h[n_] := h[n] = If[n < 1, 0, If[IntegerQ@Sqrt[8*n + 1], n, h[n - 1]]];
a /@ Range[0, 80] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 12 2021, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 28 2018
